item.title: Website Help
item.dc:creator: @robonick8 robonick8
item.description:
@robonick8 wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

Take the centering off of your original post, it makes it a little bit harder to read, at least for me it does. Are you trying to create one big square with the four boxes? Sorry if that isn’t clear enough.

Yea sorry il fix that and there suppose to be 4 separate squares. 2 on the top and 2 on the bottom with margins in between them.

They were fine until i added the images. and I appreciate the help

item.title: Website Help
item.dc:creator: @robonick8 robonick8
item.description:
@robonick8 wrote:

[center]Hey guys I know I was in the process of working on this but I am still learning html and css!

I have ran into a problem when im trying to make content boxes! The first 2 I did successfully but then the next to just fell apart D:

Heres a picture
[/center]

Heres is the html code!

<div class="center_box_0"> <img src="img/combat.png" width="60" height="25"> <h2>City Clans</h2> <font color="white"><p>Most servers usually use clans as a way of creating a little rival circle. We think this is boring and have come up with the idea to add MORE rivalry to the server. Upon login you will be able to choose what city you wish to represent the choices will be the following cities...</p> <a href="member.php?action=create" class="center_btn">Read More</a> </div> <div class="center_box_1"> <img src="img/magic.png" width="60" height="25"> <h2>Necromancy</h2> <p>This will be a teleport based interface which will come along with a new spell book that I am in the process of designing. This skill will allow you to teleport to higher level more interesting places as you progress through the skill. This skill will become unlocked at level 10 summoning and level 20 magic...</p> <a href="member.php?action=ucp" class="center_btn">Read More</a> </div> <div class="center_box_2"> <img src="img/quest.png" width="50" height="25"> <h2>New Custom Quests</h2> <p>A Little Piece of Heaven features several new custom quests such as Intzoxicated Tzak Rak Jad This quest if you choose to accept it once completed will allow you to kill Jad to obtain the fire cape and will also allow you to wear all obsidian weapons and armours...</p> <a href="member.php?action=register" class="center_btn">Read More</a> </div> <div class="center_box_3"> <img src="img/minigame.png" width="50" height="25"> <h2>Custom MiniGames</h2> <p>A Little Piece of Heaven features several new custom minigames such as <b>Heros Trials</b> This minigame takes place in the castle wars arena. You will choose a team and spawn into your team rooms and there will be a shop owner...</p></font> <a href="member.php?action=register" class="center_btn">Read More</a> </div> </div>

Here is the css

[code].center_box_0 {

height: auto;
width: 340px;
background: rgba(0,0,0,.2);
border: 1px solid #2c2c2c;
border-top: 1px solid #363636;
box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
-o-box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
padding: 10px;
float: left;

}
.center_box_1 {

height: auto;
width: 340px;
background: rgba(0,0,0,.2);
border: 1px solid #2c2c2c;
border-top: 1px solid #363636;
box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
-o-box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
padding: 10px;
float: left;
margin-left: 12px;

}

.center_box_2{

height: auto;
width: 340px;
background: rgba(0,0,0,.2);
border: 1px solid #2c2c2c;
border-top: 1px solid #363636;
box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
-o-box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
padding: 10px;
float: left;
margin-top: 25px;

}
.center_box_3{

height: auto;
width: 340px;
background: rgba(0,0,0,.2);
border: 1px solid #2c2c2c;
border-top: 1px solid #363636;
box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
-o-box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
padding: 10px;
margin-top: 25px;
margin-right: 30px;

}[/code]

Help would be very appreciated thanks!!!

Read full topic
